alfredsnippet.snippet:
Davis in F. Flam, "In Search of a New Cosmic Blueprint". Science, Vol. 254, p.1106-1108 (1991)

"In some of the newer (Big Bang) theories, we are inventing a new physical principle for every new observational fact."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - A New Physical Principle for Every New Observational Fact
